About

Here are a few facts about Mr. Ella...

Born on Friday, 1st of March 1968 in Bauchi, Mr Ella Aji Williams started his early Education at Fatima private School Jos in the then Benue - Plateau. He completed his primary School Education at Demonstration primary school in Makurdi Benue State. He later attended St Francis secondary school in Otukpo Benue State. His tertiary Education saw him through University of agriculture Makurdi from where he bagged a Bachelor's degree (B.Eng) in Agricultural Engineering. He went further to acquire a Master's Degree (M.Eng) in production management and optimization. Mr Ella join the National youth service corps in 1998 as an inspector 1 and has risen through the ranks through hardwork, discipline, mental focus and great presence of mind. He is currently an assistant director heading the deployment and Relocation branch in NYSC Secretariat Enugu. He is Married With 2 kids. His hobbies are basketball, movies, chess, reading and writing.
